thread.title: First Electric Daisy Carnival, Brazil reveals massive artist lineup
thread.title_full: First Electric Daisy Carnival, Brazil reveals massive artist lineup

author: eTN Global Editor
title: First Electric Daisy Carnival, Brazil reveals massive artist lineup
text:
First Electric Daisy Carnival, Brazil reveals massive artist lineup   
Aug 18, 2015 eTN   
LOS ANGELES, CA - Today, Insomniac and Time for Fun (T4F) announced the incredible lineup of more than 60 artists who will travel to South America to perform at the first ever Electric Daisy Carnival, Brazil. This groundbreaking event will mark the first time North America's largest dance music festival will debut in South America. EDC will transform the Autodromo de Interlagos in Sao Paulo into a breathtaking destination for fans to experience the most popular acts in dance music on Friday, December 4 and Saturday, December 5, 2015. 
"I feel so fortunate to be able to make one of my longtime dreams come true by bringing EDC to the beautiful country of Brazil," said Pasquale Rotella, Insomniac Founder and CEO. "The energy in Sao Paulo reminds me of the positive vibes here in SoCal, and I can't wait to deliver a new experience to our international Headliners!" The soundtrack to your EDC Brazil getaway starts here: 
Above & Beyond Heiken vs Loop Adventure Club Hook N Sling Alok Jam Thieves Amine Edge & DANCE Jamie Jones Anna Jonas Rathsman
